page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT-PLAYING PLACE
page.content: ENTERTAINMENT This is a rural area with just two halls where entertainment could be staged. Most people go to Truro and Falmouth where there are{cinemas}and {theatrical events. } The hall in Carnon Downs is used for {theatrical productions}both serious and humorous, three times a year.In January there are {pantomimes}and there are also{Barn dances}and{discos. The Playing Place hall is used for {discos, Barn dances,pantomimes}and {garden parties. { }In Kea,{travelling players}visit schools to play{instruments,}act{plays and{perform. } Schools in this area act plays and have their own orchestras.They sometimes play music to their families at special times of the year.
